name: The Bee Menace
description:
Programmed and Developed in 6 Hours during the 6HourGameJam by Allen-Michael Brower @Ambocclusion

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement

Space Bar / Left Mouse Button - Special attack when the CHARGED! bar is full.

If you have a problem controlling your character, click the "Unity WebGL" banner under the game window.
